clintock:DeoxyribosePower.NAME: Deoxyribose
DESCRIPTIONS: Sugar derived from ribose. NL Essential molecule in generating nucleotides.

clintock:FluorophorePower.NAME: Fluorophore
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases the potency of bound nucleobases.

clintock:NanoporePower.NAME: Nanopore
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add a random nucleobase to your hand.

clintock:PeptideChainPower.NAME: Peptide Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, activate your chain of amino acids.

clintock:PhosphatePower.NAME: Phosphate
DESCRIPTIONS: Phosphorus bound to 4 oxygen residues. NL Essential molecule in generating nucleotides.
